specifications.Finish: Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Sustainability Eco-fiber > Recycled Yarn Recycled yarn is a special type of yarn manufactured from waste textiles and other materials. This kind of yarn is created from waste materials, such as plastic bottles, as well as 'textile-to-textile' waste. Recommended Use Activewear, T-shirts
